name: Grandpa Horror House Escape
description:
Enjoy the thrill of getting engaged in Grandpa Horror House Escape, where the grandson is looking to escape from grandpa haunted house. The grandson has to explore various clues or findings to enter the haunted house. After entering the haunted house, grandpa soul will guide him to reach the coffin hidden on the second floor of the house. Once the grandson will enter the haunted house, the zombies will try to stop him from reaching the grandpa house. Will you be able to survive in the horror house? Experience a dark story and escape from ghosts and evil zombies before the night is over?

You have to intelligently explore various sections of the haunted house, collect clues, providing information about next clues. In order to survive the grandson has to collect the deadly weapons to eliminate zombies in the house. Pick head torch as well as stun gun flashlight to enter the endless fun and hours of gameplay. Zombies do hear everything; you have to be cautious at every step, you have to mark your movements, you can easily hide in house wardrobes or behind house doors and under beds. Each clue will facilitate in finding the lucky guide to reach the grandpa house, all the clues are hidden at various locations in the house. Expertly collect all clues from the house by eliminating all zombies in the house with numerous weapons collected at various locations and find the key to grandpa room and free his soul from the haunted house.

More about Grandpa Horror House:

- Head Torch to play with night mode!
- Comprehensive Designed guides with clues!
- Intuitively designed horror & engaging levels!
- Beautifully designed 3d graphics & animations!
- Stun gun flashlight to immobilize the grandpa for 7 secs!
- Hidden objects locks with keys and weapons to eliminate zombies in the haunted house!
